title: Fedora Linux Embraces "Privacy Preserving" Telemetry
description:
I don't know what's happening over in the Red Hat side of the world but Fedora Linux is the next Red Hat adjacent project to do something incredibly controversial and that's proposing opt-out telemetry which they call privacy preserving telemetry
